text: Does anyone know if there are plans to make menu markup editable?

haven’t heard them announce anything - it is a hotly requested feature though.

I think from their standpoint they may not be super gungho about it as they currently handle accessibility for menus and it requires the html and css to be in the structure they have in order to work
You can create a custom menu using the simple menu. BUT I think they has some JS tied to the main menu doing things. It would be nice if this wasnt the case.

Would it be useful to have the underlying menu data exposed like in simple menus?

We’re in talks about making menus more developer friendly and if you have any inputs/asks feel free to post here.
Yea I would say so, then we could do our own loops and whatnot to create non-standard menus.
huh, wonder what I did differently
maybe it only engages when it is code view?
